title: GENERAL NEWS.
snippet:
; GENERAL NEWS.

A man named Owen Crewe was at tending some horses at Roseneath, near Peak Hill, N.S.W., when he was savagely attacked by a draught mare .with a foal at toot. The animal bit Crew in the throat, almost tearing it out. He was taken to the hospital, but soon afterwards succumbed.
